data.text:
Everyone sees the dream but they’re fulfilled by those who have the equanimity to work hard. In the competitive world it’s essential for the students to stay at the top of the rank in each and every field. Medical is one of the most successful career options for a student. In the medical field a student will find a lot of career opportunities and many options to earn money for living a cheerful life. To fulfill the dream of becoming a doctor, MBBS abroad is the best for pursuing a medical degree.

Russia is the best country for achieving the goals of becoming a doctor. In Russia the Indian and the other foreign students will get the chance to interact with the professionals, experts, specialists and well educated personalities. MBBS in Russia is always the best choice for the students who want to get all the facilities and privileges during their medical courses.

In the MBBS profession a person gets the highest salary package, honor, respect and a prestigious life. In the world there are so many universities and colleges are established but its confusion for the students which universities are the best for MBBS abroad. In MBBS in Russia the students will get the strong infrastructure and solid structure to study.

Russia is the fastest growing country in the world and the government of this country has always announced many schemes and plans to support the educational institution and to improve the quality of the university. In Russia the international students will get the platform to pursue higher education. The country is also always ready to welcome the students who come from across the world.

Pursuing the medical degree is not an easy task for the students. The students have to give their 100 percent dedication and hard work for getting the degree of MBBS. But it’s also true that a good university plays a big and important role in the life of the student. Russia offers many marvelous universities to study MBBS abroad.

Chuvash State Medical University

Chuvash State Medical University is the leading university in Russia. The university was founded in 1967 and it’s located at Cheboksary in Russia. The university has over 10,000 students, 150 professors, and more than 3000+ faculties. In this medical university the Indian student will find the best education system with modern labs, advanced classrooms and a special doubt session which is conducted regularly.

Kabardino Medical University

Kabardino Medical University offers the best option for pursuing a medical degree in Russia. In this university the student will get the benefit of scientific, education, social and cultural research. The university was established in 1957 in Nalchik City. The university has been honored by many international awards and achieved for its outstanding services and support system.

Kabardino Medical University is ranked within the top 100 universities in Russia. The university is an educational hub which delivers a variety of courses for the higher, secondary, post-graduate and other professional diplomas. This university has a good reputation, supportive and highly qualified teachers, professors and staff that trained almost 2000+ students every year.

The students are taught by skillful and well educated teachers, who provide them with up-to-date learning resources, study materials and focus on the essence of knowledge.

The medical qualification of this has been recognized globally. The medical graduates of OrSMU can practice their medicine all over the world.

The OSMU is popular for its services and support system as well as to provide the platform for the strong academic research, internship programs, practical training and high standard medical facilities. In this university the students will find the laboratories, library, teaching hospitals, hostel/ dormitory and food canteens etc during their medical curriculum or program.

FMGE Exam

FMGE is the Foreign Medical Graduate Exam that’s required for those MBBS graduates who have completed their medical degree from the international university. The FMGE is like a licensure exam that is mandatory for the MBBS abroad doctors to start practicing medicine in India. After qualifying FMGE exam the foreign MBBS graduates will get the medical license from the Indian authorities to start practicing medicine in the hospitals, medical stores, health care centers, medical institutions, clinic and infirmary in India.

The National Board of Examination (NBE) organizes the Foreign Medical Graduate Exam (FMGE) every two times a year in the months of June and December.

FMGE Exam Syllabus

The FMGE Exam syllabus is so simple and easy. NBE conducted the exam in the two phases. FMGE Phase 1 and FMGE 2. The FMGE examination is based on the CBT (Computer Based Test) where medical aspirants attempt the 300 Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs).

Frequently Asked Questions (FQAs)

Q.1. which university is the best for the MBBS in Russia?

Ans: The top medical universities for MBBS in Russia are: – Chuvash State Medical University, Kabardino Medical University, Ingush State Medical University,

Q.2. what is the eligibility criteria for the MBBS Abroad in Russia?

Ans: The student must have to qualify the NEET exam as well as he/she must have the 50% score in 12th class with main subjects Physics, Biology, and Chemistry. 40% marks required for reserved category candidates.

In addition, the student has a minimum age of 17 to get the admission in the MBBS in Russia University.

Q.3. Is the NEET exam mandatory to get admission in an international university?

Ans: Yes, NEET (National Eligibility cum Entrance Test) is mandatory to get admission in the MBBS abroad. There are so many universities that have a requirement to submit the NEET score card to get admission in the international universities.
